item.title: Meetup - Tuesday 25th April 2017 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: Our next meetup is part of Leeds Digital Festival so weâ€™ve pulled out all the stops for two top class tech speakers: Chris Urwin of Rancher sharing thoughts on using Container Technologies Ian Massingham of Amazon Web Services giving us the latest news from re:Invent Tickets are now available via our event page
